pages.text: Your first shelter will not be a masterpiece of architecture, but it's goal is to help you survive through the night and provide a safe space to prepare your food, materials and water.  Try to make it small enough to build in a short amount of time, as you'll likely be racing against the descending sun.

Holes in the ground, walled-off caves, or small wooden huts make excellent good first night shelters.  Remember to create space for a fire and furnace, a path for pollution to escape, with a doorway to control entry and keep hostile mobs out and you might just make it through the night.
